Modules:
# Chart Of Accounts

The Chart of Accounts is the blueprint of the accounts in your organization.
It is a tree view of the names of the Accounts (Ledgers and Groups) that a Company requires to manage its books of accounts. ERPNext sets up a simple chart of accounts for each Company you create, but you can modify it according to your needs and legal requirements.

For each company, Chart of Accounts signifies the way to classify the accounting entries, mostly
based on statutory (tax, compliance to government regulations) requirements.

There's a brief video tutorial about chart of accounts in the next step.
模組:
# 科目表

科目表是貴公司帳務處理的藍圖

科目表是一種樹形結構(台帳與科目組），本系統在新建公司時會自動創建一個簡單的科目表，用戶可根據相關法律法規要求修改科目表

請觀看以下科目表簡介教學以了解更多細節

# Account Settings

This is a crucial piece of configuration. There are various account settings in ERPNext to restrict and configure actions in the Accounting module.

The following settings are avaialble for you to configure

1. Account Freezing 
2. Credit and Overbilling
3. Invoicing and Tax Automations
4. Balance Sheet configurations

There's much more, you can check it all out in this step
模組:
# 會計設定

此設定比較關鍵，影響會計模組多個方面

重要的設定項如下

1. 科目凍結
2. 信用額度及超額開發票
3. 發票與自動計稅
4. 資產負債表設定

本步驟可查看更多可配置資訊

Modules:
# Chart Of Accounts

The Chart of Accounts is the blueprint of the accounts in your organization.
It is a tree view of the names of the Accounts (Ledgers and Groups) that a Company requires to manage its books of accounts. ERPNext sets up a simple chart of accounts for each Company you create, but you can modify it according to your needs and legal requirements.

For each company, Chart of Accounts signifies the way to classify the accounting entries, mostly
based on statutory (tax, compliance to government regulations) requirements.

There's a brief video tutorial about chart of accounts in the next step.
模組:
# 科目表

科目表是貴公司帳務處理的藍圖

科目表是一種樹形結構(台帳與科目組），本系統在新建公司時會自動創建一個簡單的科目表，用戶可根據相關法律法規要求修改科目表

Modules:
# All about sales invoice

A Sales Invoice is a bill that you send to your Customers against which the Customer makes the payment. Sales Invoice is an accounting transaction. On submission of Sales Invoice, the system updates the receivable and books income against a Customer Account.

Here's the flow of how a sales invoice is generally created


![Sales Flow](https://docs.erpnext.com/docs/assets/img/accounts/so-flow.png)
模組:
# 銷售發票

銷售發票是你發給客戶請求其支持款項的單據。銷售發票是會計相關業務，提交銷售發票後系統自動生成會計憑證登記應收帳款和收入

以下是典型的銷售流程

Modules:
# What's a Purchase Invoice?

A Purchase Invoice is a bill you receive from your Suppliers against which you need to make the payment.
Purchase Invoice is the exact opposite of your Sales Invoice. Here you accrue expenses to your Supplier. 

The following is what a typical purchase cycle looks like, however you can create a purchase invoice directly as well.

![Purchase Flow](https://docs.erpnext.com/docs/assets/img/accounts/pi-flow.png)
模組:
# 什麼是採購發票
採購發票是供應商發給你，申請向其付款的憑證
採購發票與銷售發票方向相反

以下是典型的採購流程，也可以不經採購及收貨直接創建採購發票

Modules:
# Setting up Taxes

Any sophisticated accounting system, including ERPNext will have automatic tax calculations for your transactions. These calculations are based on user defined rules in compliance to local rules and regulations.

ERPNext allows this via *Tax Templates*. These templates can be used in Sales Orders and Sales Invoices. Other types of charges that may apply to your invoices (like shipping, insurance etc.) can also be configured as taxes.

For Tax Accounts that you want to use in the tax templates, go to:

`> Accounting > Taxes > Sales Taxes and Charges Template`

You can read more about these templates in our documentation [here](https://docs.erpnext.com/docs/user/manual/en/selling/sales-taxes-and-charges-template)
模組:
# 設定稅
複雜的會計系統，包括ERPNext都可以在業務交易中自動計稅，自動計稅基於用戶按當地稅法定義的計稅規則

ERPNext使用稅模費板定義計稅規則， 稅模板可用於銷售訂單與銷售發票。銷售發票上的其它費用如運費、保險費等也可通過稅費模板設定

`> 會計 > 稅 > 銷售稅費模板`

更多稅費模板內容請參見文件 [這裡](https://docs.erpnext.com/docs/user/manual/en/selling/sales-taxes-and-charges-template)

Modules:
# Review Stock Settings

In ERPNext, the Stock module’s features are configurable as per your business needs. Stock Settings is the place where you can set your preferences for:
- Default values for Item and Pricing
- Default valuation method for inventory valuation
- Set preference for serialization and batching of item
- Set tolerance for over-receipt and delivery of items
模組:
# 檢查庫存設定

庫存模組功能可基於業務需求進行設定，典型的可設定項如下
- 物料與價格控制預設值
- 默認庫存(成本價)計價方式
- 物料批號與序號規則
- 超量入、出庫容差

Modules:
# Setup a Warehouse
The warehouse can be your location/godown/store where you maintain the item's inventory, and receive/deliver them to various parties.

In ERPNext, you can maintain a Warehouse in the tree structure, so that location and sub-location of an item can be tracked. Also, you can link a Warehouse to a specific Accounting ledger, where the real-time stock value of that warehouse’s item will be reflected.
模組:
# 設定倉庫
倉庫是存放及收、發物料的地方

倉庫是一種樹形結構，即可以定義倉庫的下層節點，可以為倉庫定義相關的庫存科目，該倉庫的物料移動就會自動記帳到對應的存貨科目

Modules:
# Manage Stock Movements
Stock entry allows you to register the movement of stock for various purposes like transfer, received, issues, repacked, etc. To address issues related to theft and pilferages,  you can always ensure that the movement of goods happens against a document reference Stock Entry in ERPNext.

Let’s get a quick walk-through on the various scenarios covered in Stock Entry by watching [*this video*](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Njt107hlY3I).
模組:
# 管理物料移動
物料移動用來記錄各種類型的物料異動，如調撥、入庫、出庫、重新包裝等，為更好地控制庫存被偷盜或其它原因的滅失，可以設定所有出庫均需關聯原始業務單據。
更多細節，請觀看 [*此影片教學*](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Njt107hlY3I).

Modules:
# Update Stock Opening Balance
It’s an entry to update the stock balance of an item, in a warehouse, on a date and time you are going live on ERPNext.

Once opening stocks are updated, you can create transactions like manufacturing and stock deliveries, where this opening stock will be consumed.
模組:
# 更新初始庫存
庫存調帳用於將上線時間點庫存檔點結果匯入新系統

初始庫存匯入(更新)後，即可進行各種消耗庫存的業務操作，如生產調撥、銷售出庫等

Modules:
# Check Stock Reports
Based on the various stock transactions, you can get a host of one-click Stock Reports in ERPNext like Stock Ledger, Stock Balance, Projected Quantity, and Ageing analysis.
模組:
# 查看庫存報表
在系統中產生了各種庫存業務(物料移動)記錄後，即可查看各種庫存報表，如物料憑證(庫存移動明細)，庫存餘額(收發存匯總表),又稱即時庫存，庫齡，預期可用庫存等
公司主營業務(顯示在網站首頁的大標題)
例如“建築工人的建築工具！”

Modules:
# Track Material Request


Also known as Purchase Request or an Indent, is a document identifying a requirement of a set of items (products or services) for various purposes like procurement, transfer, issue, or manufacturing. Once the Material Request is validated, a purchase manager can take the next actions for purchasing items like requesting RFQ from a supplier or directly placing an order with an identified Supplier.
模組:
# 管理物料需求

物料需求又稱採購需求，是因採購、調撥、生產等目的產生的對原材料的需求，物料需求被審批後，可以下推詢價、報價或直接生成採購訂單

Modules:
# Create first Purchase Order

Purchase Order is at the heart of your buying transactions. In ERPNext, Purchase Order can can be created against a Purchase Material Request (indent) and Supplier Quotation as well.  Purchase Orders is also linked to Purchase Receipt and Purchase Invoices, allowing you to keep a birds-eye view on your purchase deals.
模組: 採購訂單是採購業務的核心，採購訂單可由物料需求、供應商報價或銷售訂單下推，從採購訂單可下推(關聯)採購入庫、採購發票、付款

Modules:
# Buying Settings


Buying module’s features are highly configurable as per your business needs. Buying Settings is the place where you can set your preferences for:

- Supplier naming and default values
- Billing and shipping preference in buying transactions
模組:

採購模組有很多可配置選項，比如

- 供應商編號規則及預設值
- 採購業務中的發票及出貨
